title: Google Camera on my Pixel 4a doesn't have Cinematic pan when using Video capture?
content:
I already toggled on the Video stabilization in the GCcam Settings, but still GCam doesn't have the Cinematic pan in may options, GCam only opts Standard stabilization. I'm using version 8.2.204.362396359.12. My Pixel 4a build number is RQ2A.210405.005.

Watch it here
